item.title: 自動發布到ftp
item.description: 背景 目的 hugo 修改完以後,自動更新到ftp 材料 檔案內容.drone.yml kind: pipeline type: docker name: default trigger: branch: - master steps: - name: submodules image: alpine/git commands: - git submodule init - git submodule update --recursive --remote - name: Version check image: linchao/hugo-builder pull: never commands: - echo "Checking Hugo version. e" - hugo version - name: Build image: linchao/hugo-builder volumes: - name: srcsite path: /drone/src/build pull: never commands: - hugo --destination /drone/src/build #- minify -r -o /drone/src/build /drone/src/build - name: deploy image: cschlosser/drone-ftps volumes: - name: srcsite path: /_site environment: FTP_USERNAME: from_secret: linchao FTP_PASSWORD: from_secret: a2236527 PLUGIN_HOSTNAME: www2.
